extendedInfo.description: As the official companion app to the online community of the same name, JeepÂ® Badge of Honor puts the off-road experience in your hand â so you can join in âcelebrating off-road enthusiasts who've chosen the road less travelledâ  â anywhere and everywhere you go.Off-roading fans can now sign in, sign up and check in to legendary off-road trails across the U.S.A. earmarked by JeepÂ® Badge of Honor, plus:âª Discover specially featured off-road trails and maps, âª Get trail locations and directions, information, trail highlights and trail difficulty ratings âª Earn Trail Points and ranks within the Jeep Badge of Honor community, plus special Hard Badges to put on your Jeep vehicleâª Upload and share photos from your adventures with other fans in the Jeep Badge of Honor community âª Enter Off-Roading 101 for off-roading basics, important safety reminders, the history of off-roading, information on dealing with different types of off-road terrain and to learn about Jeep Trail RatingsDownload it today to take the JeepÂ® off-road experience with you everywhere you go. Then get out and hit the trails!Plus, don't forget to visit the online JeepÂ® Badge of Honor experience at jeep.com/en/badge-of-honor to connect with the Jeep Badge of Honor community, check out other off-roadersâ photos, enjoy and upload videos, track your progress and check out whatâs new in the off-road community before planning your next adventure!

reviews.title: Pointless app
reviews.comment: Sort by near me doesn\'t work or use GPS, exiting and relaunching resets sort to alphabetical.  You would think the trail database would be a few hundred thousand with jeeps since 1941
reviews.author: Jaime Maldonado

reviews.title: need more texas trails
reviews.comment: live in texas and there are places to go here. would like to see them addes. hidden falls adventure park is one of the many places texas has
reviews.author: seth cappen

reviews.title: Need some WA trails...
reviews.comment: There are very few trails in this app... it would be nice if users could add their own trails... kind of like \"Map My Ride\", there could be an option of \"Map My Trail\".
reviews.author: Faye Doll

reviews.title: Great App! Lots of fun!
reviews.comment: Works great on Casio G\'zOne Commando. I just completed Engineer Pass. Everything worked fine and my badge should be on the way. Please add some trails near KS. Tuttle ORV or Kansas Rocks would be good. Disney Oklahoma should def neon here!
reviews.author: Travis Herrington

reviews.title: Update with more trails
reviews.comment: Tons of missing trails. Plus adding a exit application option would be nice. How that got missed who knows. Half assed job making this app. Only two trails listed for Big Bear,Ca.  Really? Try looking at map there are a lot more. Giving two stars for for a half assed job.
reviews.author: Christopher Ellis

reviews.title: Needs more trails
reviews.comment: I don\'t live far from uwharrie national forest. There are great trails there. I am actually a little surprised to find that Uwharrie nor Tellico are in this app
reviews.author: Jason Durdle

reviews.title: Needs more trails
reviews.comment: Needs more trails especially for Texas! Not to mention every time I open the app I can\'t close it. I have to turn  my phone off to get out!
reviews.author: Alicia Horn

reviews.title: Dont bother
reviews.comment: The app is virtually useless on gs4
reviews.author: Kendall Clutts

reviews.title: Cool Jeep app
reviews.comment: Great idea for earning badges to put on your Jeep
reviews.author: Justin Kirkey

reviews.title: Still needs another update...
reviews.comment: Since update, i am unable to view any trails. App is still slow and lagging. Complete trail list will not load. Hoping to use this app for upcoming Jeep Jamborees and club trail rides.  But it still needs work. Lots of potential...Droid razr running ICS.
reviews.author: Mel O

reviews.title: Never leaves loading screen
reviews.comment: The ap was always slow since last update it doesn\'t do anything
reviews.author: Sean Gallagher

reviews.title: Hangs at Loading Grill
reviews.comment: The app just hangs at the Loading Grill. Too bad because it looks like it\'d be fun.
reviews.author: Dan Singleton

reviews.title: Needs help
reviews.comment: No Arizona trails. Hire someone who knows Jeeping.
reviews.author: Mike Rubio

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: Won\'t even sign in tried both facebook and google accounts.  Has cool potential though
reviews.author: Eric Higginson

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: This app is very good for me and my Jeepin peepz. It only got 3 stars cause it needs many more trails. But I love this app. I have shared it with my community\'s on Google +.
reviews.author: John Atencio

reviews.title: Won\'t start
reviews.comment: Attempts to load but won\'t then closes
reviews.author: Edward Galvin

reviews.title: Storage
reviews.comment: Pleas allow for SD card storage.
reviews.author: Alberto Montalvo

reviews.comment: App freezes on loading screen.
reviews.author: Brandon Paddock

reviews.title: Re-rating
reviews.comment: Had to come back and rate again, first time downloading the app did not work. App now loads and appears to be working well.
reviews.author: Scott Smithberger

reviews.title: Expected better
reviews.comment: Does not load full pages - cuts off where screen ends. Can only shut down app with force stop. Only has the most popular trails with none even in my state - Texas.
reviews.author: Bruce Jacques
